snippet: Former employees of an anti-aging clinic and others with ties to it told investigators that the Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez arranged to buy documents from the clinic, according to two people briefed on the case.
abstract: Former employees of a now-shuttered South Florida anti-aging clinic and others who had ties to it have told Major League Baseball that the New York Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez arranged to purchase documents from the clinic to keep them out of the hands of baseball officials; Rodriguez;  since admitting several years ago to using performance enhancers has had to meet with baseball’s investigators on several occasions as new allegations have periodically linked him to drug use.
lead_paragraph: Former employees of an anti-aging clinic and others with ties to it told investigators that the Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez arranged to buy documents from the clinic, according to two people briefed on the case.

headline.seo: Baseball Believes Alex Rodriguez Bought Clinic Documents
headline.main: Yankees’ Rodriguez Tied to Clinic Records Purchase
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Rodriguez Is Linked To Buying of Clinic Documents
